page.title: 05Lound Horse Show
page.content: Lound Horse Show takes place each year on a Sunday in July. It has been running for ten years. It has been held in three different fields. This year it is in Mr. Powell's field. There are twenty-seven events. There are showing events, jumping events and gymkhana games. About one thousand schedules are printed. Three hundred horses and ponies come to the show. A lot of them come in horse boxes. People come every year from far away. There is a blacksmith in case one of the horses loses a shoe. There is a saddlery stall and people from the Women's Institute serve refreshments. They also have a display of farming bygones. The show starts at 9.45 a.m. and finishes at 8.OO p.m. At the end of the day the horses are all very tired.
